DELTA server & Raid Testing!
I have an update for you all regarding the Raid/Endgame testing from our Dungeon and Systems teams!

* Guilds already signed up for raid tests will continue those scheduled tests as normal, moving to Delta on Saturday. We either already have your rosters or have contacted you asking for them. If you have changes in light of the details below, please get in touch with the usual raid scheduling contact-person.

==

Many of you may have noticed that the new DELTA server has been added to the Alpha test. This server has been brought online specifically for RAID / Endgame testing and is invite only. You can make characters on DELTA however the vast majority of zones and services are shut down so you will not be able to level up on this server. Below is some more information about DELTA and what to expect with upcoming raid / endgame tests.

How the DELTA Server Works
Delta has most of its zones and services disabled, so even though you can make a character on this server you cannot level it. The only zones available are specific zones developers will bring online for testing. If you are interested in participating in DELTA, please follow the instructions later in this post.

Signing Up for DELTA Testing
Delta is for invite only testing for organized and experienced guilds to help us test our endgame content (Expert Dungeons, Raids, Rift Raids, Endgame zone events). As such we are only transferring guilds that meet the following requirements:


* Guild leaders can submit their guild roster for testing by emailing it to community@riftgame.com
* Guild must commit to signing up for at least one scheduled test a week
* All players must be present and ready to begin raiding 15 minutes before their scheduled start time
* Guild must supply a Â“RosterÂ” of players that meets one or both of the below requirements
* 10 man testing
* Minimum roster of 10 players
* Maximum roster of 15 players
* No more than 5 of these players can be under level 50
* 20 man testing
* Minimum roster of 20 players
* Maximum roster of 30 players
* No more than 10 of these players can be under level 50

Slots for scheduled raid testing is LIMITED; as such not all applicants may be accepted and we do reserve the right to remove any guild from testing if they fail to meet the requirements for the tests (ex: repeat late-shows, etc.).

As always we appreciate everyone´s dedication to making RIFT the best game possible and we look forward to raiding with you all on DELTA soon!

-Rift Dungeon & System teams
